{

    {
      "name": "LayoutView #document",
      "bounds": [785, 626],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF"

      "position": [18, 10],
      "bounds": [749, 145],
      "drawsContent": false
    },
    {

      "position": [14, 316],
      "bounds": [757, 153],
      "drawsContent": false,
      "contentsVisible": false
    },
    {
      "name": "LayoutImage IMG class='visible composited box'",
      "position": [38, 340],
      "bounds": [100, 100],
      "drawsContent": false
    }
  ]
}
